txt.en:
'As you may or may not be aware, a party of visitors from far away lands is preparing to depart. Some of them are of high name, and it is meet that they set forth with all of the provisions they need.

'For that reason, I would have you hunt the boars of the High Moor for meat. This can be dried as rations for the travellers.

'Will you aid me with this?'
Collect boar-flanks on the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected boar-flanks on the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Elf-scout Canaddal is concerned with outfitting and provisioning a party of visitors to Rivendell as they prepare to depart.
Boars can be found throughout the High Moor, in the Trollshaws.\n\nCanaddal has asked you to hunt boars for meat to dry for rations.
'Ah, thank you, [placeholder]! These will do nicely.'
'Have you brought the meat I requested?'
Canaddal is posted at the head of the path leading down to the Bruinen Gorges from the High Moor.\n\nYou should bring the boar-flanks you collected to Canaddal.
